What is a noted limitation of AlphaFold-: It provides static structural predictions that may not capture dynamic conformational changes.
It cannot predict the primary sequence of proteins.
It is unable to model monomeric proteins.
It lacks the ability to predict protein folding pathways.
What is the primary focus of AlphaFold-M: Designing nanobody binders for the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
Predicting the entire genome sequence of SARS-CoV-2.
Analyzing the transmission patterns of SARS-CoV-2.
